Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: Goldenrod Avenue continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: There are a number of small shops and stores along the south side of the road. There's nothing but a great, brown wall on the other side. The brown color of the wall is how the village got its name, by the way. Atop the wall you can see a few lounging village militia, who are supposed to be on lookout duty. Mostly they just look for pretty girls on this side of the wall, however.
